# 白的 báide bright white ray 𓇳 rì 日

白 /braːɡ/ /bˤrak/ bright > pale

白兔 báitù 𓃹 •punt > bunny
白兔 báitù la'bit rabbit 𓃹

白 bái white 囗 wéi Wehr enclosure 𓊪 Weide Weiler waice 白 bái 𓊪 phoai! 四,回,國,圖,只 zhī 艾 Ài 哎! Āi! 哀 āi

白 < 擘 *preːɡ ≈ pugna fist

Proto-Sino-Tibetan *bawk (“white”) Proto-Bodo-Garo *bok (“white”), Limbu ᤑ (phô, “white”)

Proto-Sino-Tibetan *bar (“white”) with -k extension, 皤 (OC *baːl, “white, pale”) vâr Proto-Karen *ʔ(b)wa (“white”)

白 ≈ 𓆇 ≈ 𓏐 •Buchegger "acorn" <> 𒌐 𒉭

also compare Proto-Mon-Khmer *kɓɔɔk (“white, grey”).

白 brái ≈ Brunn 𓈞 𓈟 原 yuán inn quán 泉 (peculiar) 伯 bó BRO, paleo, boss eldest brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/respectful form of address 迫 pò pow! force<press <> potence 柏 bǎi bò BAUM BOREAL 白木 cypress < 迫 praːɡ "press" 拍 pāi pat beat 伯 bó boss <> ᵇhuáng 皇 ≈ fēng 蜂 𓆤 𓆥 king / queen bees 巴 bā Bar ba pa to hope/wish / Palestine Pakistan Pascal (unit of pressure) 巴 •boob@mum 貝 贝 beì buy 皆 πᾰν-πᾶς •pan 𓎟 jīe "all" 帕 pà pouch 卑 bēi base bottom- 舶 bó boat, vessel (white sail ) 泊 bó to boat (moor, anchor) 珀 pò poir pyro amber 皖 wǎn bright; bright star •Venus Anhui 皓 ᵇhào hell bright white 皑 ᵇaí aice 冫 white (of snow/etc.) 帛 bó wool/silk ball <> 穆 mù mono 毛 máo 白 bˤrak <> black 皂 zào 北 běi BACK 白 white/black north

𓏲 wéi < 百 bǎi 100 hundred 百 ≈ 一 白 yī baí Wende: 60-120 days?

皋 (bái)gaō bank/marsh 皈 guī go with so.
